description:
PorteuX 1.7 distribution is now available for download based on Slackware Linux, powered by Linux kernel 6.11, and featuring the GNOME 47.1 and KDE Plasma 6.2.1 desktop environments. Here's what's new!

The post Slackware-Based PorteuX 1.7 Launches with Linux 6.11, GNOME 47.1, and More appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Slackware-Based PorteuX 1.7 Launches with Linux 6.11, GNOME 47.1, and More
